rows.label: tlk502110_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm actually a Blade of grass, y'know!
And I've got a name! Hotaru!

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0006
rows.name:
I mean... We don't see a lot of plants
and stuff in Luxuria. There's so much
snow. I got a bit carried away.

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0007
rows.name:
I see. You like trees and plants and
stuff like that?

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0008
rows.name:
Would you like to hear about the flora
they have in other places?

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0011
rows.name: You bet! Yeah! Tell me about it!

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0013
rows.name:
Wow! I had no idea there was so much
green stuff out there in the world!

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0014
rows.name:
That was really interesting... You told
me about things that I've never even
read about.

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0015
rows.name: So I'd like to give you a little thank-you!

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0017
rows.name:
Uhm...Miss, is it okay if I touch your
clothes? Like, are they made of some
special plants or something?

rows.label: tlk502110_msg0023
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps my charm failed me this time.
